prepared-picker.name: Prepared Picker
prepared-picker.description: Harvesting a Forageable will occasionally drop a Seed version, if it can be grown.

a-day-well-spent.name: A Day Well Spent
a-day-well-spent.description: Going to bed with zero stamina gives a stamina boost the next day.

green-thumb.name: Green Thumb
green-thumb.description: Planting a Seed will sometimes also Water the soil of the targeted tile.

refreshing.name: Refreshing
refreshing.description: Watering a crop will sometimes refund the Stamina used.

bountiful.name: Bountiful
bountiful.description: Watering a crop will occasionally drop a Seed version of it.

heavy-duty.name: Heavy Duty
heavy-duty.description: Tilling soil will sometimes drop a piece of Stone or Wood.

well-watered.name: Well Watered
well-watered.description: Watered crops will occasionally retain their water through the next day.

nice-swing.name: Nice Swing
nice-swing.description: Grants a chance that tilling refunds the stamina it uses.

living-off-the-land.name: Living off the Land
living-off-the-land.description: Harvesting a crop will occasionally drop a cooked dish that uses the crop.

superb-sower.name: Superb Sower
superb-sower.description: You can now charge your seeds to spread them across a wider area.

harvest-time.name: Harvest Time
harvest-time.description: Slow-Growing crops now reach their first-time harvest a day earlier.

prize-winning.name: Prize Winning
prize-winning.description: Harvesting crops will occasionally drop coins based on 5% of their selling price.

sickle-sword.name: Sickle Sword
sickle-sword.description: You can now use your sword to harvest crops quickly.

ornamental.name: Ornamental
ornamental.description: Harvesting a crop or forageable will sometimes drop a recipe teaching you how to make an ornamental furniture version of the plant.

perfect-pollinators.name: Perfect Pollinators
perfect-pollinators.description: Legendary bugs will now appear more often.

magic-design.name: Magic Design
magic-design.description: Giant Essence Stones are now craftable, and can power a statue for 40 days.

earthly-essence.name: Earthly Essence
earthly-essence.description: Harvested crops now have a low chance of dropping a Magic Seed. Who knows what will grow if you plant it?

weedline-watcher.name: Weedline Watcher
weedline-watcher.description: Fishing up Junk will become less likely.

aquatic-antiquities.name: Aquatic Antiquities
aquatic-antiquities.description: Aquatic Artifacts can sometimes be fished up.

appealing-reeling.name: Appealing Reeling
appealing-reeling.description: Fish will become attracted to your Bobber from a greater range.

catch-of-the-day.name: Catch of the Day
catch-of-the-day.description: Catching a Fish will sometimes refund the Stamina used.

lucky-haul.name: Lucky Haul
lucky-haul.description: Catching a fish will sometimes drop double the amount.

perfect-catch.name: Perfect Catch
perfect-catch.description: Uncommon and rare fish will become more common.

school-crasher.name: School Crasher
school-crasher.description: Swimming into a Fish School will drop half its contained items without spending Stamina.

unexpected-haul.name: Unexpected Haul
unexpected-haul.description: Treasure Boxes will become more likely to appear when Fishing.

full-class-i.name: Full Class I
full-class-i.description: Fish schools will all contain an additional Fish.

legendary.name: Legendary
legendary.description: Legendary fish can now appear when the season and weather conditions are right.

treasure-trove.name: Treasure Trove
treasure-trove.description: You can no longer catch Wooden Treasure Boxes, and you are now more likely to catch a higher tier of Treasure Box.

weedline-watcher-ii.name: Weedline Watcher II
weedline-watcher-ii.description: Fishing up Junk will become even less likely.

appealing-reeling-ii.name: Appealing Reeling II
appealing-reeling-ii.description: Fish will become attracted to your Bobber from an even greater range.

frenzy.name: Frenzy
frenzy.description: Catching a fish will occasionally cause a fish school to spawn nearby.

what-a-catch.name: What a Catch
what-a-catch.description: Fish have a chance of dropping coins worth 10% of their value when caught.

lucky-haul-ii.name: Lucky Haul II
lucky-haul-ii.description: Catching a fish is even more likely to drop double the amount of the fish.

abyssal-ascendence.name: Abyssal Ascendence
abyssal-ascendence.description: You now have a chance to fish up an Abyssal Chest that drops a unique set of clothing or an Essence Stone, dredged up from mysterious sunken ruins.

museum-quality-i.name: Museum Quality I
museum-quality-i.description: Digging up Uncommon Artifacts will become more likely.

unpeatable.name: Unpeatable
unpeatable.description: Digging up Peat, Sod, and Clay will sometimes drop double the usual amount.

sunken-secrets.name: Sunken Secrets
sunken-secrets.description: Dive spots can now contain Sunken Artifacts.

western-ruins-scholar.name: Western Ruins Scholar
western-ruins-scholar.description: An additional Dig Site will appear daily at the Western Ruins.

sunken-treasure.name: Sunken Treasure
sunken-treasure.description: Treasure Chests are more likely to appear when diving.

stoneturner.name: Stoneturner
stoneturner.description: Artifacts will sometimes drop from breaking Rocks in the Mines.

eastern-road-scholar.name: Eastern Road Scholar
eastern-road-scholar.description: An additional Dig Site will appear daily on the Eastern Road.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.description: Digging up Peat, Sod, or Clay increases your chances of finding an Uncommon or Rare Artifact the next time.

back-in-vogue.name: Back in Vogue
back-in-vogue.description: Artifacts will now sell for 25% more tesserae.

natural-beauty.name: Natural Beauty
natural-beauty.description: Biome Furniture Recipes will sometimes drop from Dig Sites in the Mines.

well-placed.name: Well Placed
well-placed.description: Out of Place Artifacts will sometimes drop from Dig Sites in the overworld.

museum-quality-ii.name: Museum Quality II
museum-quality-ii.description: Digging up Rare Artifacts will become more likely.

former-farmers.name: Former Farmers
former-farmers.description: A dig site will now appear daily on your farm, with a new artifact set to collect.

museum-quality-iii.name: Museum Quality III
museum-quality-iii.description: Digging up Legendary Artifacts will become more likely.

back-in-vogue-ii.name: Back In Vogue II
back-in-vogue-ii.description: Artifacts now sell for an additional 25% more tesserae.

natural-beauty-ii.name: Natural Beauty II
natural-beauty-ii.description: Biome Furniture Recipes are now more likely to drop from Dig Sites in the Mines.

mist-sight.name: Mist Sight
mist-sight.description: A Mist Spot will appear daily around Mistria where the veil between worlds is thin, allowing you to reach through and pull forth artifacts from the magic realm in exchange for essence.

waste-not-want-not.name: Waste Not Want Not
waste-not-want-not.description: Cooking a dish will occasionally return one of its ingredients afterward. (10%)

time-to-eat-i.name: Time To Eat I
time-to-eat-i.description: The Cook Time for all cooking recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.

restorative-cooking.name: Restorative Cooking
restorative-cooking.description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Restorative Infusion, which grants an HP & Stamina Regen buff when consumed.

taste-maker.name: Taste Maker
description: Cooking Recipes will sometimes drop from Treasure Chests in the

award-winning.name: Award Winning
award-winning.description: Cooked Dishes given as Liked Gifts will reward more Heart Points than before.

likable-cooking.name: Likable Cooking
likable-cooking.description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Likable Infusion, turning the item into a Universally Liked gift.

seasoned.name: Seasoned
seasoned.description: Finding Uncommon or rarer Forageables will become more likely.

time-to-eat-ii.name: Time to Eat II
time-to-eat-ii.description: The Cook Time for all cooking recipes will be reduced by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 20 minutes.

a-way-to-the-heart.name: A Way to the Heart
a-way-to-the-heart.description: Cooked Dishes given as Loved Gifts will reward more Heart Points than before.

dinner-for-two.name: Dinner For Two
dinner-for-two.description: Cooking a dish will sometimes create a bonus extra dish. (5%)

speedy-cooking.name: Speedy Cooking
speedy-cooking.description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Speedy Infusion, which grants a Speed Boost buff when consumed.

time-to-eat-iii.name: Time to Eat III
time-to-eat-iii.description: The Cook Time for all cooking recipes will be reduced by another 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 30 minutes.

lovable-cooking.name: Lovable Cooking
lovable-cooking.description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Lovable Infusion, turning the item into a Universally Loved gift.

snacktime.name: Snacktime
snacktime.description: The time it takes to eat has been reduced by half.

caffeine-crimes.name: Caffeine Crimes
caffeine-crimes.description: Consuming an item with the Speedy infusion will now double both its speed boost and the buff's duration.

magical-meals.name: Magical Meals
magical-meals.description: Cooking a Four Star dish and above will occasionally result in a bonus Mana Infusion, which restores a mana orb when consumed.

fairy-cooking.name: Fairy Cooking
fairy-cooking.description: Cooking a Four star dish and above will occasionally result in a bonus Fairy Infusion, which grants a One-Time Revival buff when consumed.

feeding-frenzy.name: Feeding Frenzy
feeding-frenzy.description: Hay and Grass Seed drop at double the usual amount from Cutting Grass.

close-bond.name: Close Bond
close-bond.description: Animals that have been Pet and Fed for the day will receive an extra Heart Point increase.

barnyard-bounty-i.name: Barnyard Bounty I
barnyard-bounty-i.description: Chickens and Cows will sometimes drop extra Produce.

currency-of-care.name: Currency of Care
currency-of-care.description: When animals eat crops, either by hand feeding or by grazing, they will drop the currency Shiny Beads.

welcome-home-i.name: Welcome Home I
welcome-home-i.description: Newly brought or born animals will start at 1 Heart Level.

feed-prepper.name: Feed Prepper
feed-prepper.description: The Craft Time for all animal feed in reduced by 10 minutes.

currency-of-care-ii.name: Currency of Care II
currency-of-care-ii.description: Animals that have been Pet and Fed for the day will sometimes drop Shiny Bead the next day in addition to their regular Produce.

discount-treats.name: Discount Treats
discount-treats.description: Heart shaped treats sold by Hayden will have a 10% price reduction.

currency-of-care-iii.name: Currency of Care III
currency-of-care-iii.description: Animals can now be fed cooked dishes and will reward more Shiny Beads based on the dish's star level.

welcome-home-ii.name: Welcome Home II
welcome-home-ii.description: Newly bought or born animals will start at 2 Heart Level.

barnyard-bounty-ii.name: Barnyard Bounty II
barnyard-bounty-ii.description: Ducks and Horses will sometimes drop extra Produce.

wind-down.name: Wind Down
wind-down.description: The Mill Time for all mill recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes

the-bell-tolls.name: The Bell Tolls
the-bell-tolls.description: You will receive the Big Bell crafting recipe. When rung, the Big Bell calls out or sends in all animals into their buildings.

maximum-milling.name: Maximum Milling
maximum-milling.description: Crafting Animal Feeds at the mill will sometimes drop an additional item of the same kind.

barnyard-bounty-iii.name: Barnyard Bounty III
barnyard-bounty-iii.description: Sheep and Rabbits will sometimes drop extra Produce.

hammer-timing-i.name: Hammer Timing I
hammer-timing-i.description: The Craft Time for all crafting recipes wil be reduced by 10 minutes.

lumberjack-i.name: Lumberjack I
lumberjack-i.description: Breaking a Branch will sometimes drop an extra piece of Wood.

masonry-i.name: Masonry i
masonry-i.description: Breaking a Rock will sometimes drop an extra piece of Stone.

forager.name: Forager
forager.description: Chopping down a Tree will occasionally drop a seasonally appropriate Forageable.

hammer-timing-ii.name: Hammer Timing II
hammer-timing-ii.description: The Craft Time for all crafting recipes will reduce by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 20 minutes.

natural.name: Natural
natural.description: Chopping down any tree will occasionally drop Hardwood.

quality-crafting.name: Quality Crafting
quality-crafting.description: Crafting an Item will occasionally result in a bonus Quality Infusion, which grants it a 10% higher selling price.

working-with-the-grain.name: Working with the Grain
working-with-the-grain.description: Crafting an item will occasionally return one of its ingredients afterward.

material-world.name: Material World
material-world.description: Material drops from breakables in the Mines now drop twice as much.

steady-supplies.name: Steady Supplies
steady-supplies.description: Sod, Peat, and Cattails can now be purchased at the Carpenter's Shop.

set-pieces.name: Set Pieces
set-pieces.description: Crafting an item can occasionally give you two of it.

hammer-timing-iii.name: Hammer Timing III
hammer-timing-iii.description: The Craft Time for all crafting recipes will reduce by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 30 minutes.

lumberjack-ii.name: Lumberjack II
lumberjack-ii.description: Breaking a Branch, felling a tree, or chopping down a stump will always drop an extra piece of Wood.

underground-inspiration.name: Underground Inspiration
underground-inspiration.description: Coral and Crystals now drop materials twice as often.

deliberate-debris.name: Deliberate Debris
deliberate-debris.description: Farm debris will spawn 50% less often. This perk can be toggled on and off.

working-with-the-grain-ii.name: Working with the Grain II
working-with-the-grain-ii.description: Crafting an item is now even more likely to return one of its ingredients afterward.

copper-expert.name: Copper Expert
copper-expert.description: The amount of Copper Ore required to craft Copper Ingots will be reduced by 1.

time-sensitive-i.name: Time Sensitive I
time-sensitive-i.description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.

sharp-blacksmithing.name: Sharp Blacksmithing
sharp-blacksmithing.description: Crafting a Weapon will occasionally result in a bonus Sharp Infusion, which grants it an additional +1 Attack Power.

fortified-blacksmithing.name: Fortified Blacksmithing
fortified-blacksmithing.description: Crafting Armor will occasionally result in a bonus Fortified Infusion, which grants you an additional +4 HP when worn.

iron-expert.name: Iron Expert
iron-expert.description: The amount of Iron Ore required to craft Iron Ingots will be reduced by 1.

time-sensitive-ii.name: Time Sensitive II
time-sensitive-ii.description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will reduce by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 20 minutes.

leech-blacksmithing.name: Leech Blacksmithing
leech-blacksmithing.description: Crafting a Weapon will occasionally result in a bonus Leech Infusion, which restores 1 HP each time it's used to attack a Monster.

lightweight-blacksmithing.name: Lightweight Blacksmithing
lightweight-blacksmithing.description: Crafting a Tool will occasionally result in a bonus Lightweight Infusion, occasionally dropping Stamina orbs on use.

empowered-i.name: Empowered I
empowered-i.description: Crafting a Tool, Weapon, or Armor will be more likely to result in an available Infused version.

hasty-blacksmithing.name: Hasty Blacksmithing
hasty-blacksmithing.description: Crafting Armor will occasionally result in a bonus Hasty Infusion, which grants you an additional 4% Speed Boost when worn.

silver-expert.name: Silver Expert
silver-expert.description: The amount of Silver Ore required to craft Silver Ingots will be reduced by 1.

time-sensitive-iii.name: Time Sensitive III
time-sensitive-iii.description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will reduce by another 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 30 minutes.

empowered-ii.name: Empowered II
empowered-ii.description: Crafting a Tool, Weapon, or Armor will be a bit more likely to result in an available Infused version than before.

gold-expert.name: Gold Expert
gold-expert.description: The amount of Gold Ore required to craft Gold Ingots will be reduced by 1.

tireless-blacksmithing.name: Tireless Blacksmithing
tireless-blacksmithing.description: Crafting Armor will occasionally result in a bonus Tireless Infusion, which grants you an additional +4 Stamina when worn.

time-sensitive-iv.name: Time Sensitive IV
time-sensitive-iv.description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will reduce by yet another 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 40 minutes.

earth-breaker.name: Earth Breaker
earth-breaker.description: Breaking a Rock in the Mines will occasionally destroy all other Rocks in a 1x3 area around it.

ore-riginal.name: Ore-riginal
ore-riginal.description: Biome-Specific Ore will sometimes drop from Breaking Rocks in the Mines.

reclaimer.name: Reclaimer
reclaimer.description: Biome-Specific Furniture will sometimes drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.

treasure-hunter.name: Treasure Hunter
treasure-hunter.description: Treasure Floors will sometimes appear in the Mines.

iron-hound.name: Iron Hound
iron-hound.description: Breaking an Iron Node will occasionally drop an extra piece of Iron.

true-blue.name: True Blue
true-blue.description: Breaking a Sapphire Node will occasionally drop an extra Sapphire.

treasured.name: Treasured
treasured.description: Treasure Chests will become more likely to appear in the Mines.

mine-time.name: Mine Time
mine-time.description: Movement speed will increase for 10 seconds when you first enter a new Floor.

resonance.name: Resonance
resonance.description: Defeating an enemy can break a nearby rock.

earth-breaker-ii.name: Earth Breaker II
earth-breaker-ii.description: Breaking a Rock in the Mines will occasionally destroy all other Rocks in a 1x3 area around it and is now more likely to occur.

silver-seeker.name: Silver Seeker
silver-seeker.description: Breaking a Silver Node will occasionally drop an extra piece of Silver.

fantastic-finds.name: Fantastic Finds
fantastic-finds.description: You can no longer find Wooden Treasure Chests, and you are now more likely to find a higher tier of Treasure Chests.

lost-to-history.name: Lost to History
lost-to-history.description: Ritual Chamber Floors will sometimes appear in the Mines.

good-as-gold.name: Good as Gold
good-as-gold.description: Breaking a Gold Node will occasionally drop an extra piece of Gold.

refined-rockery.name: Refined Rockery
refined-rockery.description: The Craft Time for all Stone Refinery recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.

break-one,-get-two.name: Break One, Get Two
break-one,-get-two.description: Crafting a recipe at the Stone Refinery will sometimes create a bonus crafted item.

guardian's-shield.name: Guardian's Shield
guardian's-shield.description: Once per day, the first hit you take is reflected.

true-strike.name: True Strike
true-strike.description: Your Attacks will occasionally become Critical, doing double damage in the Mines.

jump-attack.name: Jump Attack
jump-attack.description: Jumping and then Attacking mid-air will damage enemies in a small radius.

well-armed.name: Well Armed
well-armed.description: Biome-unique Armor and Weapons will sometimes drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.

quick-footed.name: Quick Footed
quick-footed.description: Blue Sapling pools will grant a short Speed Boost rather than slow you down.

what-an-offer.name: What an Offer
what-an-offer.description: Using an Offering Shrine will bestow a short HP & Stamina Regen buff in addition to their usual effect.

generous-in-defeat.name: Generous in Defeat
generous-in-defeat.description: Monsters will occasionally drop twice as many items when defeated.

dungeon-delicacies.name: Dungeon Delicacies
dungeon-delicacies.description: Certain Cooked Dishes will occasionally drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.

perfect-prefix.name: Perfect Prefix
perfect-prefix.description: The infusion power of Infused Weapons will double.

rocking.name: Rocking
rocking.description: Clod Projectiles that are reflected back are now much more likely to critically strike.

in-motion.name: In Motion
in-motion.description: Defeating a Monster will sometimes grant a brief Speed Boost.

out-of-juice.name: Out of Juice
description: now briefly freeze in place after discharging.

sonic-boom.name: Sonic Boom
sonic-boom.description: If you attack the Essence Bat's sonic attack, unleash a Sonic Boom, damaging all enemies around you.

gift-exchange.name: Gift Exchange
gift-exchange.description: When you throw an item into a resting Mimic Chest, it will drop two items instead of one.

guardian's-shield-ii.name: Guardian's Shield II
guardian's-shield-ii.description: Your Shield will now activate randomly at low chance.

true-strike-ii.name: True Strike II
true-strike-ii.description: Your Attacks are more likely to become Critical, doing double damage in the Mines.
